description:
An intuitive diagram software with templates for any scenario.

EdrawMax is a powerful, all-in-one, and yet easy-to-use diagramming tool that enables users to visualize the ideas effortlessly. With EdrawMax, you can create and customize flowcharts, Venn diagrams, mind maps, organizational charts, Gantt charts, UML diagrams, electrical drawings, genograms, building plans, etc.
1. The flowchart function now includes a hand-drawn style and a series of creative flowchart templates.
2. Edraw AI now supports generating flowcharts from code.
3. The network diagram function has added automatic connection buttons.
4. The issue of being unable to print annotations has been fixed.
5. The problem of being unable to change the color of bullet points in text has been resolved.
6. Other optimizations and bug fixes have been implemented.
